collection_utilities module¶

Utility methods for working with lists and dictionaries

utilities.collection_utilities.make_dict(keys, values)¶

Creates a new dictionary by pairing the items in the first sequence with items in the second sequence.

Parameters

  • keys – a sequence of keys

  • values – a sequence of values

Returns

a dictionary built from the keys and values sequences

utilities.collection_utilities.merge_dicts(d1, d2)¶

Combines the entries of two dictionaries to make another dictionary.

Parameters

  • d1 – the first dictionary

  • d2 – the second dictionary

Returns

a dictionary created from the entries of d1 and the entries of d2

utilities.collection_utilities.merge_lists(l1, l2)¶

Combines the elements of two lists to make another list.

Parameters

  • l1 – the first list

  • l2 – the scond list

Returns

a list created from the elements of l1 followed by the elements of l2
